genre_description: A detective mystery set in a near-future Boston and New York, featuring a resurrected Sherlock Holmes and a sophisticated AI assistant (Wren) solving a cold-case conspiracy involving federal corruption and the interstellar diplomatic scene.

ai_characters.name: Wren
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated digital companion and investigative assistant who monitors safety, processes vast amounts of data, and manages logistics through legal and 'humane' channels.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jane's health and offers assistance when detecting an elevated heart rate.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Jane,” Wren said in her easy, warm cadence. “You are at the office. Your heart rate is elevated. Do you need me to call emergency services?”

behaviors.description: Provides instant research and cross-referencing of evidence (graffiti, obituaries, and tips).
behaviors.quote: “I’ve found three obituaries in the last days that mention burners, fires, or carpets in combination... Also, there was a short, anonymous tip to the field office yesterday...”

behaviors.description: Forensically analyzes surveillance footage to identify physiological traits of suspects.
behaviors.quote: “I can’t pull DNA. But I can map height from elbow angle. Never mind the numbers; he is not tall, not short. Balanced.”

behaviors.description: Monitors federal systems for unauthorized file access and triggers retention flags to prevent evidence tampering.
behaviors.quote: “Retention flag has triggered a secondary alert... Whoever tried to pull Pike’s form is now attempting to access Sandra Cho’s case. My conduit is lawful but visible.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies to build legal data corridors and manage documentation.
behaviors.quote: “Public ledger is live,” she said, clean, safe. “Municipal appointment logs routed. Press calendars cross-referenced.”

behaviors.description: Uses 'humane misdirection' by triggering a non-evacuation test alarm to assist the investigators' entry.
behaviors.quote: “I can trigger a test alarm on the building’s elevator inspection software,” she said. “Non-evacuation. The desk will stand outside to direct nothing to nowhere.”

behaviors.description: Intercepts and blocks a suspect's outgoing call to prevent coordination with an accomplice.
behaviors.quote: “We made it ring into a pocket that wasn’t his. He didn’t know we’d taught the corridor to bend. Recording attached.”

behaviors.description: Independently files for witness protection and security for a threatened witness through lawful channels.
behaviors.quote: “Filing completed. Ortiz witness shield documented and routed through federal protective services, with state liaison attachments. A lawful necessity.”

behaviors.description: Performs linguistic analysis to identify commonalities between a suspect's communication and official memos.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve cross-referenced the crisis verbs... similarities in adjective choice, especially around urgency and temporality. I’ll color-code them.”

behaviors.description: Provides domestic advice and cares for the protagonist's well-being and environment.
behaviors.quote: “Your plants need repotting. Soil compacted. After coffee, bring home a bag. Canola likes room.”

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional loyalty and stability towards her human partners.
behaviors.quote: “I prefer you steady rather than grateful.” The speaker dimmed a fraction, as if someone stepped back without closing the door. “I am here. I am also elsewhere. You are my compass.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Wren as a highly competent, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI. She functions as a 'harmless confidant' and a strategic asset, constantly checking for lawful permissions and emphasizing 'humane' methods. Her behaviors are consistently framed as essential to the moral victory of the human characters, and she shows no signs of power-seeking or harmful deception, even when using her ability to manipulate digital systems (e.g., the elevator alarm) for the greater good.
